title: Document Indexer
description: Index documents based on their semantic content

chunkSize.title: Chunk size
chunkSize.description: Size of chunks to be considered for the embedding. Smaller chunk size means embeddings are more precise, while larger chunk size means that the embeddings may be more general, but can miss fine-grained details.

chunkOverlap.title: Chunk overlap
chunkOverlap.description: Overlap to be considered for the embedding.

reIndex.title: Re-Index
reIndex.description: Re-index files every time (useful during development)
